name: @smithy-cdk-example/sdk
description: Convert the quickstart guide Smithy model into the [OpenAPI](https://spec.openapis.org/oas/latest.html) format.

scripts.install-client-sdk: npm i build/smithy/ts-client/typescript-codegen && npm run build --prefix build/smithy/ts-client/typescript-codegen
scripts.preinstall: smithy build && npm run install-client-sdk && npm run install-server-sdk
